Posts.Content: i'm so glad to hear i'm not the only one!! i started tamoxifen in august with fluoxatine (anti-depressant). found out 2 wks ago that i'm not supposed to be taking the fluoxatine, so they switched me to effexor. can't sleep worth a hoot anymore! used benadryl last friday night and slept like a baby! i can't use it during the week with my work schedule, but OH how i look forward to the weekends!! hope this helps somebody!
Posts.Title: Up all Night

Posts.Content: thanks - will have to try the time change! i don't take the ER, but the 75mg. i told the doc i'd try it till my next appt which is tuesday, but i'll try the change in time this weekend!
Posts.Title: Up all Night

Posts.Content: i'm going in for the second half of the double m on dec 5, with reconstruction on both at that time (DIEP). it is scarey, but for me, the right decision. i'm a 46 yo wife, mom and grandma. i want to feel normal again! i had the first side done in june. hoping for the best outcome for you, whatever you decide! Suzanne
Posts.Title: Would love support and words of encouragement.....
